---
category: news
title: "A Natural Language Processing Framework To Analyse The Opinions On HPV Vaccination"
excerpt: "In this study, researchers created a natural language processing (NLP) framework to analyse the perspectives on HPV vaccination expressed on Twitter during a 10-year period, from 2008 to 2017. The sentiment study shows how sentiment has changed over the last ten years."
